title: Stepan Paul
text: I am an Associate Teaching Professor at North Carolina State University where I’ve worked since 2020. I focus on teaching, curriculum development, mathematical illustration, and service to the undergraduate program in the department.

title: Projects
text:
Tangent Developable of a Twisted Cubic


Visulaizations of the tangent developable of a twisted cubic curve illustrating its ruling and flat metric.



Stepan Paul and Adrien Abgrall


Feb 28, 2025













Spindle Earth


A visualization of the spindle earth, a surface of revolution with constant positive curvature and two singular points.



Stepan Paul and Steve Trettel
